name: Fix Another update is currently in progress
author: Mahesh M. Waghmare

sections.description:
Zero configuration. One click fix “Another update is currently in progress.” which occurs while updating the WordPress core or auto updating the thems & plugins.

Read more in one page quick documentation.

Highlights

  • Zero configuration
  • Easy to use
  • One click remove locks
  • Remove Plugin update lock (Option name core_updater.lock)
  • Remove Core WordPress update lock (Option name auto_updater.lock)
  • Quick support

Welcome for featured requests

If you have any suggestion or any featured request then don’t hesitate to contact.

Bug reports

Bug reports for “Fix Another Update” are welcomed in our repository on GitHub. Please note that GitHub is not a support forum, and that issues that are not properly qualified as bugs will be closed.

Further reading

For more info check out the following:

  • The maheshwaghmare.com official website.
  • The Contact Me.
  • The Getting started guide.
  • Other my WordPress Plugins.
  • Contribute with development.
  • Make a small donation.
sections.installation:
1. Install the Fix Update in Process plugin either via the WordPress plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.
  2. Goto Tools > Fix Update in Process
  3. Click on Release All Locks.
